mapper.update: MERGE INTO tbl_cart a USING DUAL ON (a.productid = #{productid}) when matched then update set a.productstock = #{productstock} when not matched then insert (a.cartNum, a.productid, a.productstock) values(tbl_cart_seq.nextval, #{productid}, #{productstock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum asc) as num, c.cartNum, c.productid, c.productstock, c.addDate, p.ptitle, p.price, p.pimg , p.stock from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_product p on c.productid = p.productid
